name: Facturas Cobranza
query:
select si.name as factura, si.creation as fecha_creacion, si.posting_date as fecha_factura, c.name as cliente, c.customer_name as nombre, c.company_name as company, c.customer_group as tipo_cliente, c.item_group as portafolio_mas_factura,
		c.territory as departamento, c.municipio, c.barrio, c.address_line1, si.tipo_factura, si.currency, si.grand_total as total, si.outstanding_amount as saldo, si.owner as creado_por 
from `tabCustomer` c inner join `tabSales Invoice` si on c.name = si.customer
where si.naming_series=%(serie)s and si.docstatus=1 
and si.creation>=%(FechaD)s
and si.creation<=%(FechaH)s
